listitem.para: The IKE port to listen on. The default value is 500. As IKE is an internet standard, changing this means pluto will no longer be able to interop with other devices, unless they have also been explicitly configured to use a non-standard IKE port. There might also be other subtle assumptions within the kernel that port 500 is used. Changing this port is strongly discouraged, and should probably only be done for testing or when required to circumvent VPN blocking technologies as employed by certain commercial companies and national governments. See also nat-ikeport.
